question: Which E-commerce Company has recently rolled out “Project Zero” in India?
explanation: To block selling of counterfeit goods on its platform, e-commerce giant Amazon has introduced ‘Project Zero’ in India, in a bid to ensure that customers receive authentic goods when shopping on Amazon. It introduces additional proactive mechanisms and powerful tools to identify, block and remove counterfeits. More than 7, 000 brands have already enrolled in Project Zero across United States, Europe and Japan. A number of Indian brands participated in a pilot to help Amazon test the experience in India.
